summary: The PlayStation 3 (PS3) is a video game console made by Sony. It was released in 2006 and replaced the PlayStation 2. The PS3 competed with the Xbox 360 and Wii. It was the first console to use Blu-ray Discs. Over time, it became more popular due to its Blu-ray features and improved game selection. The PS3 sold well, with 87.4 million units sold worldwide. It was eventually replaced by the PlayStation 4 in 2013, and production was discontinued in 2017.
title: PlayStation 3
